page.description: Reset the query as if it had just been created.
page.discussion: The Reset() function resets the values in the SQL::DeleteStatement object as if it had just been created.
page.example: dim del as SQL::DeleteStatement del.SQLstatement = "DELETE FROM Customer WHERE lastname > 'G'" ? del.SQLStatement = "DELETE FROM CustomerWHERE (lastname > 'G')" del.reset() ? del.SQLStatement = "DELETE FROM"
